message.body: Hey mom what's your recipe for the acv drink? Richard made some this morning and it was way too vinegary!
So I mix up 1/2 cup honey in hot water to melt it; 1 cup ACV & fill the bottle with water. Enjoy! Did he like his cake?
Yes, he was really surprised and happy! Thanks, we'll try that. Did you know braggs sells bottled acv drinks? There's one with apple juice that's really good.
I just take my morning shot & that's it. I'm going to kohls today after work... Hopefully your shirts still there!
Richard is really, really into this date cake.
